about.summary: Provides useful tools for structural equation modeling.
Provides useful tools for structural equation modeling.

name: r-semtools
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.5-7" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-semtools
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/semTools_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/semTools/semTools_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 39cb5e04ee3f479bfdf57669b9c599ae4775412a4d8991a9855bc06e7753e6b0

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-lavaan >=0.6_5
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-lavaan >=0.6_5

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('semTools')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('semTools')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/simsem/semTools/wiki
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Provides useful tools for structural equation modeling.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
